short_summary: Delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax. All bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
full_summary:
**Multiple Victoria-Class Spares Tender**
=====================================================

**Tender Details**
----------------

* Tender ID: W8482-230634/A
* Reference Number: PW-22-01005583
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: August 30, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 12, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: September 21, 2022
* Tender Status: Expired

**Solicitation Information**
-------------------------

* Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia and British Columbia

**Procurement Details**
--------------------

The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the procurement of various spares for Victoria-Class vessels. The spares include:

* Inhibitors (GSIN 5820, NSN 99-7785099)
* Tube Sub-Assembly (GSIN 5965, NSN 99-5267213)
* Switches (GSIN 5930, NSN 99-5480689)
* Coils and Microphones (GSIN 5965, NSN 99-2692922)
* Batteries (GSIN 6135, NSN 99-3355022)
* Buzzers (GSIN 6350, NSN 99-6224510)
* Headsets and Microphones (GSIN 5965, NSN 99-5316629)

The tender documents can be downloaded from the Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada website. Bid submission must be in either English or French.

**Contact Information**
-------------------

For more information regarding this tender, please contact:

* Darrell Hill, Contracting Authority
* Email: [darrell.hill@forces.gc.ca](mailto:darrell.hill@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available

**Attachment**
-------------

The tender documents and attachments are available on the Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada website.

Note: The tender has expired and is no longer active. This notice is provided for informational purposes only. 

Let me know if you need further modifications
